item.description:
DARE Luncheon

11:30 - 12:00 PM - Open Networking

12:00 -12:30 - Lunch Is Served

12:30 - 12:45 - Introductions

Tell us in less than 1 minute who you are, what you do, what you're promoting so we can help you build your business!

12:45 - 1:15 - Presentation

Men.  They’re everywhere.  Whether we:

  • date them/are married to them
  • work with them/for them/they work for us
  • sell to them
  • buy from them
  • are business partners in some other way
  • are related to them

they are in just about every part of our lives.

If we want to have those relationships work as smoothly, successfully and harmoniously as possible, we need to know what we can expect from them (or can’t!).



In this presentation, Karen Jones, founder of The Heart Matters, will help us all explore where our expectations of men are helping us, and where they’re hurting us, and what to do so that we can experience more satisfaction in all our relationships with men.

Karen Jones founded The Heart Matters in 1997, and through coaching, seminars, teleclasses, and books, has helped women in all stages of relationship – single, married or dating - have the scrumptious relationships with men they’ve always dreamed of having.  www.TheHeartMatters.com * (978) 557-9993 * Karen@TheHeartMatters.com * Free 30-minute phone consultations * Complimentary monthly newsletter, “Ask the Coach”

group.name: Dare To Be Phenomenal's Success Minded Women's Network

item.name: DARE Networking Luncheon
